description:
Dancing Zoobles!: Chevy and Coron goes to Panky`s tree house and wakes him up as they have plans to go to the Rainbow Park together. However, after the three arrived at the park, Chevy and Panky are gonna drink the water from the fountain until they notice some Zoobles hiding behind the tree somehow scared. They then encounter three mysterious Zoobles called the Black Candies, which composed of Blacky, a Vanilla Caramel flavored Fox Zooble, Mikey, a Chocolate Mint flavored Fox Zooble and Cooper, a Chocolate Banana flavored Giraffe Zooble. The three claimed the fountain for their own and the only way to reclaim it is to Chevy and her friends win a dancing competition against them. But there is one problem: Coron and Panky doesn`t know how to dance well.
Go for it! Panky: Panky himself has a little problem crossing the pole. Because of this, Chevy and Coron consulted to Peel, a Cherry Flavored Bird Zooble to train him to be more assertive. But is this enough for him to be all active?

titles.title: Dancing Zoobles! / Go for it! Panky
ダンシング・ズーブルズ! / 頑張れ! パンキー
